description: This Dart source file defines a static class MockData that provides mocked data for a Flutter application. It includes sample categories, books, orders, wishlist entries, and methods to filter and generate mock book data for offline rendering when the app is in offline mode.

classes.name: MockData
classes.description: A utility class containing static mock data and methods for offline rendering in the app.

methods.name: categories
methods.description: A list of predefined categories for books, such as Fiction, Thriller, Tech, etc.

methods.name: books
methods.description: A list of 24 generated mock books with varying prices, ratings, and categories.

methods.name: getBooks
methods.description: A function that filters the books list based on optional category slug and price range.

methods.name: orders
methods.description: A list of 6 mock order objects referencing the books.

methods.name: wishlist
methods.description: A list of 8 wishlist entries referencing books.

methods.name: newArrivals
methods.description: A method that returns a random selection of 8 books, used for showcasing new arrivals.
